Now I know why this morning he said “Not to trigger you, but what exactly makes a cheesy gordita crunch a cheesy gordita crunch?” 😂
I wish I could explain how much this means to me. Just trust that every time we pass the local Taco Bell I sigh and look like Mary in the Pietà.

He literally went to Taco Bell and interviewed the teens on what he would need to do. Then he ordered some undressed gordita crunches and went to a bunch of stores to find the softest looking gf tortillas he could find, then cooked that biz in the cast iron skillet.

Sorry. I’m going to be that person. But I have to tell you I am crying because my partner celebrated my story being published by doing Taco Bell science and making me a gluten free Cheesy Gordita Crunch.

users.name: Sheree Renée Thomas Black Panther's Rage OUT NOW!

tweets.text:
My fellow Millennials will spend all day talking about how their parents traumatized them, and then name their kid after a Star Wars character.

We are in for a rude awakening when those kids start critiquing  our parenting in the same way we've gone after Boomers.

The number one best tip I have for anyone dealing with chronic illness is to make your health binder. 

I’m waiting in the lobby at urgent care, and I swear, even when the intake nurses see it, they treat me so differently.

Interesting reading. 👀
excerpt from: Graphic Artists Guild Pricing & Ethical Guidelines; 10th Edition (2001) https://t.co/BdwfblOUHx

The year is 1800

What would have killed you by now (that actually happened in your life?)

I look at the world, at the forests and the mountains here, the sky, and it's all right, as it should be. But we aren't. People aren't. We're wrong. We do wrong. No animal does wrong. How could they? But we can, and we do. And we never stop.
What’s a really nice thing? Sincere answers only.
Yet a greater, unlearned skill he possessed, which was the art of kindness.
